SEARCH
Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.application.controller

Class AssignTeamToEntryController

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.application.controller.AssignTeamToEntryController
public class AssignTeamToEntryController extends Object
The AssignTeamToEntryController class handles the assignment of teams to entries. It interacts with the TeamRepository and AgendaRepository to perform these operations.

    • getEntries

      public List<String> getEntries()
      Retrieves a list of entries with flags indicating whether a team is assigned.
      Returns:
      a list of strings representing the entries, with flags for team assignment

    • attributeTeamToEntry

      public void attributeTeamToEntry(int choiceTeam, int choiceEntry)
      Assigns a team to an entry and sends notification emails to the team's collaborators.
      Parameters:
      choiceTeam - the index of the chosen team
      choiceEntry - the index of the chosen entry
